content.query:
-- CETAS 
-- Create External Table As => This fn actually writes data in the specified location
-- unlike the initial create external table where we did not specify a statement following the 
-- AS clause => this actually writes the data in the specified location

USE nyc_taxi_ldw;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zone
WITH(
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
    LOCATION = 'silver/taxi_zone',
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
)
AS 
SELECT *
FROM bronze.taxi_zone;
